data.title: Da Capo
data.author: HOYO-MiX
data.lrc:
[00:00.000] 作词 : TetraCalyx
[00:00.048] 作曲 : 蔡近翰Zoe(HOYO-MiX)
[00:00.096] 编曲 : 宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)/苑迪萌Dimeng Yuan(HOYO-MiX)/崔瀚普TSAR(HOYO-MiX)/车子玉Ziyu Che(HOYO-MiX)
[00:00.144] 制作人 : 蔡近翰Zoe(HOYO-MiX)
[00:00.195]When good old friends are going away
[00:06.838]Will you wish them to remember your name?
[00:13.480]When good old days are passing away
[00:19.851]Will you promise your heart remains the same
[00:27.289]Never can we suspend the time
[00:33.943]Having to leave the tracks behind
[00:40.316]there is a longer way ahead, After all.
[00:54.403]There used to be a story teller
[01:00.242]who always painted the sunshine and the rain
[01:07.428]One has to eventually grow up
[01:13.258]Spending a lifetime to taste the love and pain
[01:20.705]Never can we suspend the time
[01:27.345]Having to leave the tracks behind
[01:33.718]there is a longer way ahead, After all.
[01:47.005]If it’s too hard to say goodbye
[01:53.372]Give us a try to sing a rhyme
[01:59.768]“May you, the beauty of this world, always shine.”
[02:13.309]
[02:13.523] 演唱 Vocal Artist：车子玉Ziyu Che(HOYO-MiX)
[02:13.737] 弦乐 Strings：龙之艺交响乐团Art of Loong Orchestra
[02:13.951] 弦乐录音棚 Strings Recording Studio：上海音像公司录音棚YX STUDIO
[02:14.165] 混音 Mixing Engineer：宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)
[02:14.379] 母带 Mastering Engineer：宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)
[02:14.593] 出品 Produced by：HOYO-MiX

data.title: Eager 4U
data.author: 曼尼洛夫
data.lrc:
[00:00.00] 作词 : 曼尼洛夫
[00:01.00] 作曲 : 曼尼洛夫
[00:02.00] 编曲 : 曼尼洛夫
[00:03.00] 制作人 : 曼尼洛夫
[00:10.93]what happened you did can you do it some more now
[00:15.15]你对我做了什么现在能不能再做一些
[00:17.38]swear you got me falling for you as a lamp
[00:20.76]我发誓你让我像一只羔羊一样任你宰割
[00:21.22]what happened you gave can i take some more now
[00:27.54]你给我了什么我还想要更多
[00:29.35]swear you got me creeping all night and day
[00:32.12]我发誓你让我整日整夜抽泣
[00:33.63]i don't wanna just see you on the weekends
[00:37.27]我不想只在周末见到你
[00:38.11]you know i got feelings
[00:39.93]你知道我对你有感觉
[00:40.43]stick around ，I'll do all the changes see them
[00:42.61]留下来，我会做出改变让你看见
[00:43.04]tell me that you feel this too
[00:45.45]告诉我你也感受到了
[00:46.23]you can be the one thing I believing
[00:48.50]你是我相信的唯一
[00:48.92]just give me a reason
[00:51.42]就给我一个理由
[00:52.32]swear you got me creeping all night and day
[00:54.58]我发誓你让我整日整夜抽泣
[01:53.88]i don't wanna just see you on the weekends
[01:57.12]我不想只在周末见到你
[01:58.13]you know i got feelings
[01:59.60]你知道我对你有感觉
[02:00.22]stick around ，I'll do all the changes see them
[02:02.61]留下来，我会做出改变让你看见
[02:03.27]tell me that you feel this too
[02:05.50]告诉我你也感受到了
[02:06.33]you can be the one thing I believing
[02:08.66]你是我相信的唯一
[02:09.25]just give me a reason
[02:11.37]就给我一个理由
[02:12.15]swear you got me creeping all night and day
[02:14.48]我发誓你让我整日整夜抽泣
